src:
のん　期間があいた同じ役に緊張…「この世界の（さらにいくつもの）片隅に」

04 Nov 2019

　女優・のん（２６）が４日、都内で行われたアニメ映画「この世界の（さらにいくつもの）片隅に」（１２月２０日公開）のワールドプレミアに出席した。
　興行収入２７億円を突破した前作「この世界の片隅に」の３年ぶりとなる新作。主人公のすず役を続投したのんは「期間をおいてから同じ役に挑むのは初めてで緊張した」とアフレコに向かうまでの心境を告白。
　不安がついて回ったが、何度も作品を見返すうちに「すずさんの皮膚感が戻ってきた」と３年前を思い出し、「強い気持ちで演じられた。気付かされることもあって再び挑めてよかった」と同作に感謝していた。
　本作は「この世界の片隅に」に、約３０分の新たな場面を追加した。
text:
Non-strained to the same role that had a period ... "In this corner (and many more)"

04 Nov 2019

Actress Noon (26) attended the world premiere of the animated film “In this corner (more) in one corner” (released on December 20) in Tokyo on the 4th.
New work for the first time in three years of the previous work “In a corner of the world” that exceeded 2.7 billion yen in box office revenue. The continuation of the hero's tin role confessed his feelings before heading for dubbing, saying “I was nervous for the first time to challenge the same role after a period of time”.
I was worried about it, but as I looked back at the work many times, I remembered that three years ago, “Suzu's skin feeling has returned,” “I was played with a strong feeling. I was grateful for the film.
This work added a new scene of about 30 minutes to “A corner of this world”.
